p: Methods: Ethics approval was obtained prior to start of the study. A prospective cohort study was performed from December 2013 to July 2014. Patients were screened daily until discharge or death, over a consecutive 28-day period. We collected data on demographic and baseline variables, co-existing diseases, serum albumin level, repositioning frequency, presence of mechanical ventilation, Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II (APACHE II) score, Sequential Organ Failure Assessment (SOFA) score, Glasgow Coma Score (GCS) and vasoactive medications.
